title: Love Island Australia host Sophie Monk flaunts her figure in a swimsuit while eating a pizza
text:
Sophie Monk was a no-show during eliminations on Wednesday's episode of Love Island Australia.

But the blonde beauty made sure to keep her legions of Instagram fans updated with what she was up to while in Fiji.

The TV host, 39, shared a photo of herself flaunting her slender and toned figure in a white one piece swimsuit while eating a slice of pizza.

Scroll down for video

How does she do it? Love Island Australia host Sophie Monk showed off her incredibly slender and toned figure in a white swimsuit while eating a slice of pizza on Wednesday

She wrote in the caption: 'My team work overtime', and asked her fans to vote for their favourite look.

Sophie also shared a video, captured by her boyfriend Joshua Gross, showing her makeup artist Normie Gonzales applying fake take to her trim pins as she continued to devour the slice.

'When you keep eating the fake props, with a fake fringe and fake tan,' she wrote in the caption.

Not an inch to pinch! There was not an inch to pinch on the blonde beauty's frame as she devoured her piping hot pizza

Joshua also took to his Instagram to share a photo of Sophie posing and eating her pizza.

He wrote in the caption: 'My two favorite things....'

The funny posts come after Sophie did not make an appearance at the villa Wednesday's elimination on Love Island Australia, which left fans baffled.

While no explanation for Sophie absence was offered, it comes after an insider told NW Joshua is planning to propose to her.

Tanning time: Sophie also shared a video, captured by her boyfriend Joshua Gross, showing her makeup artist Normie Gonzales applying fake take to her trim pins as she continued to devour the slice

'It's going to happen any day now,' said a source close to the couple.

The insider added that Joshua has planned the surprise proposal down to the very last detail.

'It'll be a romantic sunset date on the beach complete with a personalised three-course dinner of Sophie's favourite foods,' they said.

'There's zero chance that Sophie will say no. She has been waiting for this day forever,' the insider added.
description: Sophie Monk was a no-show during the elimination on Wednesday's episode of Love Island Australia.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
